author: gstein
msg: APR-ize repos.c and lock.c. trim back repos.h. Original patch by Joe Orton
with some additional APR-izing from Greg (lock.c and ap_rename_file).

author: trawick
msg: Fix the way that ap_rwrite() checks for an error from ap_bwrite().
A dropped connection could cause a loop in ap_send_mmap() (and probably
a few other places) because of this problem.

author: stoddard
msg: Temporarily disable lingerling close until I can get the sendfile path right.
This avoids a seg fault when we try to shutdown then close a socket that has

author: stoddard
msg: Do not set the sendfile flag to disconnect the socket when sending byteranges.
Thanks to Jeff Trawick for pointing this one out.

author: stoddard
msg: WinNT: Implement acceptex socket reuse. Make sure that the ap_sendfile flags
argument is properly initialized for all platforms.
